member.name: T:Sudoku.DocComments.Events
member.summary: Provides doc comments on event-delegating methods.

member.name: M:Sudoku.DocComments.Events.Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Trigger execution when a control is clicked.
member.param: The control to trigger Click event.
The event information, whose value is specified as a parameter.

member.name: M:Sudoku.DocComments.Events.TextChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Trigger execution when the text in a text box is changed.
member.param: The control to trigger TextChanged event.
The event information, whose value is specified as a parameter.

member.name: M:Sudoku.DocComments.Events.SelectionChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Trigger execution when a combo box selected to another one.
member.param: The control to trigger SelectionChanged event.
The event information, whose value is specified as a parameter.

member.name: M:Sudoku.DocComments.Events.SizeChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Trigger execution when the size of a window is changed.
member.param: The control to trigger SizeChanged event.
The event information, whose value is specified as a parameter.

member.name: M:Sudoku.DocComments.Events.ValueChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Trigger execution when the value is changed.
member.param: The control to trigger ValueChanged event.
The event information, whose value is specified as a parameter.

member.name: M:Sudoku.DocComments.Events.DragDelta(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Trigger execution of this method when a splitter changed its position.
member.param: The control to trigger DragDelta event.
The event information, whose value is specified as a parameter.

member.name: M:Sudoku.DocComments.Events.ContextMenuOpening(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Trigger execution when a context menu is opening.
member.param: The control to trigger ContextMenuOpening event.
The event information, whose value is specified as a parameter.

member.name: M:Sudoku.DocComments.Events.MouseLeftButtonDown(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Trigger execution when the left button in mouse is pressed down.
member.param: The control to trigger MouseLeftButtonDown event.
The event information, whose value is specified as a parameter.

member.name: M:Sudoku.DocComments.Events.MouseRightButtonDown(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Trigger execution when the right button in mouse is pressed down.
member.param: The control to trigger MouseRightButtonDown event.
The event information, whose value is specified as a parameter.

member.name: M:Sudoku.DocComments.Events.MouseLeftButtonUp(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Trigger execution when the left button in mouse is pressed up.
member.param: The control to trigger MouseLeftButtonUp event.
The event information, whose value is specified as a parameter.

member.name: M:Sudoku.DocComments.Events.MouseRightButtonUp(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Trigger execution when the right button in mouse is pressed up.
member.param: The control to trigger MouseRightButtonUp event.
The event information, whose value is specified as a parameter.

member.name: M:Sudoku.DocComments.Events.PreviewKeyDown(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Trigger execution when the key is down before triggering key down event.
member.param: The control to trigger PreviewKeyDown event.
The event information, whose value is specified as a parameter.

member.name: M:Sudoku.DocComments.Events.MouseDown(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Trigger execution when the mouse is pressed down.
member.param: The control to trigger MouseDown event.
The event information, whose value is specified as a parameter.

member.name: M:Sudoku.DocComments.Events.MouseUp(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Trigger execution when the mouse is pressed up.
member.param: The control to trigger MouseUp event.
The event information, whose value is specified as a parameter.

member.name: M:Sudoku.DocComments.Events.MouseMove(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Trigger execution when the mouse cursor is moved.
member.param: The control to trigger MouseMove event.
The event information, whose value is specified as a parameter.

member.name: M:Sudoku.DocComments.Events.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Trigger execution before the mouse left button is down.
member.param: The control to trigger PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown event.
The event information, whose value is specified as a parameter.

member.name: M:Sudoku.DocComments.Events.Drop(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Trigger execution when the control is dropped.
member.param: The control to trigger Drop event.
The event information, whose value is specified as a parameter.

member.name: T:Sudoku.DocComments.SearchingProperties
member.remarks: Please note that all technique searches should contain this static property in order to display on settings window. If the searcher doesn't contain, when we open the settings window, it'll throw an exception to report about this.
